note:
She/Her Mother to a deeply thoughtful son, daughter to folks I love sharing time with, partner to my best friend, living in a multi-gen household by the Salish Sea.

I teach commercial law, gov't relations, and negotiation skills to BBA students. I will post on legal decisions that catch my attention and practical info about the Canadian legal system.

I am happy in the woods or on the water with my mini-Aussie Mitzi, photographing the tiny things - I will share them here!
